author: kdeleo
body:
PR description:

This PR proposes a re-organization of the primary vertex producer code and the addition of vertex time computation for 3D vertices. Based on the work of @werdmann and @missirol. 

The 3D vertices with timing can be used as input to a single 4D iteration: in this way the first iteration of 4D vertex reconstruction can be omitted, without loss in performance and with 30% CPU time gain. 
Additionally, bug-fixes in: 
-TOFPIDProducer: switch off track-vertex re-assignment for last TODPIF iteration (tracks remain assigned to vertex as in vertex algorithm, but times are computed wrt a different vertex) 
-4D vertex time: in 4D clustering only tracks with meaningful times/time errors are used, but in 4D vertex time calculation the time of all tracks is used 

Details in the presentation at TRK POG on November 20, 2023: https://indico.cern.ch/event/1345175/contributions/5662821/attachments/2755500/4797740/MTD_PrimaryVertex_201123.pdf 

PR validation:

The PR has been tested on workflow on TTbar14TeV+PU200. Changes expected in 4D vertices and tracks with timing, for details see [presentation](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1345175/contributions/5662821/attachments/2755500/4797740/MTD_PrimaryVertex_201123.pdf) at TRK POG.
title: Vertex reconstruction: code re-organization + vertex time computation
